TextEng: <StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "I have no idea. It was as if she came out of nowhere."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "A she-devil, bent on my destruction."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "A vengeful spirit, I'm afraid."
"It was a woman of the Githzerai."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "Just a jealous lover, nothing more."
"That was the sensei. She runs the temple here."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "The Gates of Cania? No, they lie far to the south."
Text: <StartCheck>[거짓말]</Start> "카니아의 문? 아니, 저 멀리 남쪽에 있어."

TextEng: "You are in the City of Lost Souls, at the foot of Cania's gates."
Text: "여긴 잃어버린 영혼들의 도시야, 카니아의 문 바로 앞이지."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "She worshipped Tyr, the god of goodly justice."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "She worshipped the devil Mephistopheles."
"She worshipped some being called the Sleeping Man."
"It was you she worshipped."
"I'm not sure."
"I needed to get that woman's attention."
"I have run out of options and need your help."
"I needed to wake you."
"No, she isn't, but I have some requests to make of you."
Text: "아니, 그게 아니라 당신에게 부탁할 게 있어."

TextEng: "Goodbye."
"I must stop Mephistopheles."
"I wish to return home to the world of Toril."
"Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"Yes, she is..."
"Sorry, I have misspoken. I did not mean to cause alarm."
Text: "미안, 잘못 말했어. 놀라게 할 의도는 아니었어."

TextEng: "She is right here, the Lady Aribeth."
"It is I. I am your true love."
"She is there, that corpse upon the floor."
"What proof do you require to know your love?"
Text: "당신의 사랑을 알기 위해 무슨 증거가 필요해?"

TextEng: "Back to my other questions."
"How do I find this Knower of Names?"
"Back to my other questions."
"Then tell me of this ring."
"Back to my other questions."
"All right, show me the ring."
"How can it operate by virtue of hope?"
"Modrons? Mechanus? What are you talking about?"
"What do you mean it's a puzzle ring?"
"Why will she only answer one question?"
"Who's this Knower of Places?"
"What's in it for me?"
"Yeah, well, it's not enough..."
"Not interested..."
"Back to my other questions."
"I must stop Mephistopheles."
"I wish to return home to the world of Toril."
"Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"What proof can she offer you?"
"Why is she banished?"
"What sort of creature has a name like that?"
"Why were you unable to complete your quest?"
"Your one true love?"
<StartAction>Leave.</Start>
<StartAction>Wake the Sleeping Man.</Start>
<StartAction>Cut him with a knife.</Start>
<StartAction>Shout in his ear.</Start>
<StartAction>Sound the Trumpet of Pandemonium.</Start>
<StartAction>Place the sensei's amulet about your neck.</Start>
<StartCheck>[Wisdom]</Start> <StartAction>Focus your thoughts upon the crystal amulet.</Start>
<StartAction>Move forward through the mist.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the woman in white.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the woman's tear.</Start>
<StartAction>Open the door in the ice.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the question that he asks.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the ring.</Start>
<StartAction>Push further into the Sleeping Man's dreams.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>잠자는 자의 꿈 속으로 더 깊이 들어갑니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Focus on the City of Lost Souls.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the Knower's answer.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the Sleeping Man's many questions.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the voice.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the room.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the purple haze.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the Sleeping Man.</Start>
<StartAction>Re-focus on the shattered tear.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the Reaper's True Name.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the notion of banishment.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the idea of a Knower of Names.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the rebel generals.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on Mephistopheles.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the concept of the Baron.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on those crying out.</Start>
<StartAction>Focus on the name Baron Molikroth.</Start>
<StartAction>Try to determine the dream's context.</Start>
<StartAction>Examine the Sleeping Man.</Start>
<StartAction>Leave.</Start>
<StartAction>Cut him with a knife.</Start>
<StartAction>Shout in his ear.</Start>
<StartAction>Sound the Trumpet of Pandemonium.</Start>
<StartAction>Whisper the name of his one true love into his ear.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>그의 유일한 진정한 사랑의 이름을 귀에 속삭입니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Whisper his True Name into his ear.</Start>
<StartAction>Back to your previous options.</Start>
"Awaken."
<StartAction>Attack her.</Start>
"Stay your fury, Sensei, and let me explain!"
"Fa'arethia the Misguided!"
"Attack me, you fool! What are you waiting for?"
"If you wish to fight, fight your precious Sleeping Man!"
"Goodbye."
<StartAction>Attack him.</Start>
"Fight her, Celesfa'ar the Patient! You have no choice!"
Text: "그녀와 싸워, 인내하는 셀레스파르! 선택의 여지가 없어!"

TextEng: "Then suffer her blows in silence, fool!"
Text: "그럼 침묵 속에 그녀의 타격을 받아, 바보야!"

TextEng: "Stay and be quiet. It will all become clear."
Text: "가만히 있고 조용히 해. 모든 게 분명해질 거야."

TextEng: "Begone from here!"
"No one important."
"That was your one true love."
"Abandon the quest for your one true love..."
Text: "당신의 유일한 진정한 사랑을 찾는 탐구를 포기해..."

TextEng: "I have learned the name of your one true love."
<StartAction>Back to your previous options.</Start>
"It is Zyramethia the Young, the deva known as Lavoera."
"It is Phyreshi the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Names."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Phyreshi the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Names."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"It is Cordemylia the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Places."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Cordemylia the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Places."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"It is Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, the drow known as Nathyrra."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, the drow known as Nathyrra."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"It is Fa'arethia the Misguided, the githzerai known as the Sensei Dharvana."
Text: "잘못 인도된 파아레시아, 다르바나 사부로 알려진 기스제라이야."

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Fa'arethia the Misguided, the githzerai known as the Sensei Dharvana."
Text: <StartAction>[거짓말]</Start> "잘못 인도된 파아레시아, 다르바나 사부로 알려진 기스제라이야."

TextEng: "Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"It is Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, the spirit known as Lady Aribeth."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, the spirit known as Lady Aribeth."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"It is I, Ba'elzaden the Cruel, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Ba'elzaden the Cruel, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Kagita'ar the Heartseeker, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Kagita'ar the Heartseeker, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Nel'zeben the Selfish, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Nel'zeben the Selfish, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Neuthroxus the Fair, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Neuthroxus the Fair, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Ebela'ar the Kind, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Ebela'ar the Kind, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Dretchen the Dark, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Dretchen the Dark, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Lysisius the Firm, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Lysisius the Firm, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Donita'ar the Blessed, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Donita'ar the Blessed, the one known as <FullName>."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Goodbye."
<StartAction>Slap him.</Start>
"I'm sorry, let's start over."
"It was nothing. I am simply on edge, that is all."
"Your very existence displeases me."
"You presume too much, planetar."
<StartAction>Break away.</Start>
"You smell bad."
"I was teasing. If you love me, you'll need to learn how to laugh."
Text: "장난이었어. 날 사랑한다면, 웃는 법을 배워야 할 거야."

TextEng: "Good. Bathe yourself at once and then we can talk."
Text: "좋아. 당장 씻어, 그럼 얘기할 수 있어."

TextEng: "I'm counting... One... Two..."
"You won't... You'd best say your goodbyes now."
Text: "못 할 거야... 지금 작별 인사를 하는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "I will meet you in paradise, where you belong."
"I'll be in the city of Waterdeep in my homeworld of Toril."
Text: "내 고향 세계 토릴의 워터딥 시에 있을 거야."

TextEng: "I'll wait for you right here, by the Gates of Cania."
"I'm not interested in your excuses. This relationship is over!"
"I have to go."
"I'm sorry but that's none of your business."
"I'm not coming back... You'd best say your goodbyes now."
Text: "다시 안 올 거야... 지금 작별 인사를 하는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "I will see you in paradise, where you belong."
"Come find me in the city of Waterdeep in my homeworld of Toril."
Text: "내 고향 세계 토릴의 워터딥 시로 날 찾아와."

TextEng: "I will return to you here, by the Gates of Cania."
"I'm just not ready for this, all right?"
"Evil is afoot in my home world of Toril."
Text: "내 고향 세계 토릴에 악이 도사리고 있어."

TextEng: "No, you'd just be in the way."
"No, it is something I must do alone."
"You won't... You'd best say your goodbyes now."
Text: "못 할 거야... 지금 작별 인사를 하는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "Let us meet in paradise, where you belong."
"In the city of Waterdeep."
"I will return to you here, by the Gates of Cania."
"You would help me?"
<StartAction>Kiss him back.</Start>
"I don't know. Look for yourself."
"I already have the ring of which you speak."
"I already have the ring of which you speak."
"Goodbye."
"I am here to kill you."
"I am here to thank you."
"Back to my other questions."
"You've been an unwitting participant in my plans for domination!"
"You helped me find the Reaper's True Name."
"You have taught me something about myself."
"You have formed the basis of a whole religion."
"You have been a force of good in the Hells' own depths."
"I have learned the name of your one true love."
"Goodbye."
"Back to my other questions."
"It is Zyramethia the Young, the deva known as Lavoera."
"It is Phyreshi the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Names."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Phyreshi the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Names."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Yes, she was his lover."
"Then you had best go free her."
"She promised to make the journey here but has yet to arrive."
"I have freed her. If she loves you, she will find you here."
Text: "그녀를 풀어줬어. 당신을 사랑한다면, 여기서 찾을 거야."

TextEng: "It is Cordemylia the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Places."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Cordemylia the Knower, the one known as the Knower of Places."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Go to her. She will be happy to know the truth."
"I don't know. She's fled her hiding place."
"I believe she has gone mad for want of you."
"She pines for you greatly."
"It is Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, the drow known as Nathyrra."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, the drow known as Nathyrra."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Goodbye."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Enough to know that you will be happy together."
"She is dead."
"I have brought her to you. She is right here."
"She is a good soul, though haunted by her past."
"The drow have a long, evil history in my homeworld..."
Text: "내 고향 세계에서 드로우는 길고 사악한 역사를 가지고 있어..."

TextEng: "It is Fa'arethia the Misguided, the githzerai known as the Sensei Dharvana."
Text: "잘못 인도된 파아레시아, 다르바나 사부로 알려진 기스제라이야."

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Fa'arethia the Misguided, the githzerai known as the Sensei Dharvana."
Text: <StartAction>[거짓말]</Start> "잘못 인도된 파아레시아, 다르바나 사부로 알려진 기스제라이야."

TextEng: "Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Goodbye."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Enough to know that you will be happy together."
"She was here for some time but has left."
"I have brought her to you. She is right here."
"I saw her corpse in the other room."
"That is her corpse over there."
"She built this temple that stands around you."
Text: "당신 주변에 서 있는 이 사원을 지었어."

TextEng: "It is Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, the spirit known as Lady Aribeth."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, the spirit known as Lady Aribeth."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Goodbye."
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Enough to know that you will be happy together."
"She is dead."
"I have brought her to you. She is right here."
"She has become one of the Lost, frozen into Cania's ice."
Text: "카니아의 얼음에 얼어붙어 잃어버린 자들 중 하나가 되었어."

TextEng: "In life, it is said she brought great evil upon my homeworld."
Text: "살아생전에 내 고향 세계에 큰 악을 가져왔다고 해."

TextEng: "It is I, Ba'elzaden the Cruel, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Ba'elzaden the Cruel, the one known as <FullName>."

<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Kagita'ar the Heartseeker, the one known as <FullName>."

<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Nel'zeben the Selfish, the one known as <FullName>."

<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Neuthroxus the Fair, the one known as <FullName>."

<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Ebela'ar the Kind, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Dretchen the Dark, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Dretchen the Dark, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Lysisius the Firm, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Lysisius the Firm, the one known as <FullName>."
"It is I, Donita'ar the Blessed, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Donita'ar the Blessed, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>Attack!</Start>
"Celesfa'ar the Patient, I command you to believe me!"
"Celesfa'ar the Patient..."
"Back to my other questions."
"Fight me."
"Leave this place and never return."
"Abandon the quest for your one true love..."
Text: "당신의 유일한 진정한 사랑을 찾는 탐구를 포기해..."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "I have no idea. It was as if she came out of nowhere."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "A she-devil, bent on my destruction."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "A vengeful spirit, I'm afraid."
<StartCheck>[Lie]</Start> "Just a jealous lover, nothing more."
"It was a woman of the Githzerai."
"That was the sensei. She runs the temple here."
"It is I, Murdus the Wild, the one known as <FullName>."
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> "It is I, Murdus the Wild, the one known as <FullName>."
"Did I say yes? I meant no."
"I saw her corpse in the other room."
